channel.title: Help me? = ]
channel.description:
Hi. I cannot make a server for some reason, but...
I am asking for somebody to make me a server that i can edit and customize, or somebody to tell me exactly what to do from scratch since i cant make one myself. I have tried many time but i cannot get it working!
If somebody would like to make or tell me how to make a server properly i will make them co-owner if it works! =D
I know this sounds really nooby asking for this but my computer wont let me do it for some reason?? If you will do this for me just say and i will give you my email address so you can email me.
Thanks, Kratos00

@pimpylt wrote:

yea just go get test scape or somtin n work off there… or just look for serv wit pretty much notin on it n start from there they got lots of source list if u google

item.title: Help me? = ]
item.dc:creator: @Kratos00 Kratos00
item.description:
@Kratos00 wrote:

thanks, i should have probably done that and i will get started either today or tomorrow. i DO need to learn these things!!

cya round!!

Read full topic

item.title: Help me? = ]
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Ok, I am sorry but if you can’t get one set up on your own, you don’t need one. Also, for you to customize it you will need to understand java, else you will be posting here every single time you want to do something and asking for more help. And no one makes a server any more, they all edit pre existing servers.

So, what I recommend is learn a little bit about computers, they are not hard to figure out, and once you understand one fairly well, learn a language, start easy, html, then move up to css and javascript, then maybe python, then you can step up to java and it should be easy for you.

Read full topic
